Text:
it works just fine on xp, vista, and 7. im on 7 64 bit and 2 xp computers 32bit. friend of mine has vista. works well on all 4 computers. if u can't get it to work then go download the most up to date direct x 9....even if u have dx10 or later...get 9. you'll still have 10 but will also have the missing files needed to play the game.

also do a microsoft update.
